record.description: Thomas L. K. Smull, Office of Space Sciences, for the National Aeronautics and Space Administration, at ground breaking ceremonies for the University of Chicago's new $1,775,000 Laboratory for Astrophysics and Space Research of the Enrico Fermi Institute for Nuclear Studies.
